EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Working with Legacy IT_Q415.Remind
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: See you tomorrow for our webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We'd like to remind you of your registration for tomorrow's webinar Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Working with Legacy IT. Please see event details and how to join us below:
Date: Tomorrow, Tuesday, December 1, 2015 Time: 10AM PST/1:00PM EST Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1075103/298EC604D4E39304C8DF21BD65CABAD3> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date - Working with Legacy IT:default=edit me}}
While you wait, check out our replay <https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-the-greenfield-journey> of Part 1 of our installment: Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey. Cot√© reviewed how to select the right kind of project, staff it appropriately and ensure you're selecting the right technologies and practices to avoid incurring technical debt that can strip out all the advantages of being cloud native. Watch it now <https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-the-greenfield-journey>!
See you tomorrow! The Pivotal Team
